abstract: Chilean Judge Mario Carroza charges six former military officers in burning death of American resident Rodrigo Rojas during 1986 protest; Rojas' death and severe injury suffered by companion have come to represent abuses of government under Gen Augusto Pinochet.
lead_paragraph: A judge charged them in the burning death of a 19-year-old American in 1986 during a protest against the dictatorship then in power.

headline.main: Chile: 7 in Pinochet’s Military Charged in Death of Protester
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Chile: 7 in Pinochet’s Military Charged in Death of Protester
